subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Barry Bonds might love San Francisco, but he signed with the Giants because they were the only team that offered more than $7.1 million a year for at least six years.
snippet: Barry Bonds might love San Francisco, but he signed with the Giants because they were the only team that offered more than $7.1 million a year for at least six years.
